title: Empowering Multiple Instance Histopathology Cancer Diagnosis by Cell Graphs
venue: International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention

tldr.text: This work introduces a probabilistic classifier that extends Gaussian process multiple instance learning with a relational likelihood that brings improved diagnostic performance on two tissue microarray data sets (breast and Barrett's cancer) when similarity of cell layouts in different tissue regions is used as relational side information.
